title: SoftMaker Office 2008 For The Pocket PC
description:

                                  SoftMaker Office 2008



In an ideal world, you could create a file in Microsoft Office on your desktop computer, put it on your Pocket PC, edit and format it on the road, and then send it back to the office, with content and all formatting still intact.  Unfortunately, it does not work that way. Microsoft's Office Mobile is, after all these years, still not able to reliably open Microsoft Office files without massive data loss ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ all functions and formatting that it does not know, are silently stripped and thrown away. After Office Mobile touched them, many files share only a distant resemblance with what they once were.





                 The only desktop-quality office suite for your Pocket PC





Enter SoftMaker Office 2008 for Pocket PCs. This full-featured office suite lets you open, edit, and save any Microsoft Word,Excel, or PowerPoint file on your Pocket PC. Directly and without conversion, retaining all the formatting, functions, and contents of your Office files. Good riddance to Microsoft's puny Office Mobile! SoftMaker Office 2008 is here.




           SoftMaker Office 2008 comes with the following applications:



TextMaker: Multi-language spell-checker. Graphics that can be anchored to paragraphs, tables, or pages. Footnotes and endnotes. Tables with built-in calculations. "Track changes" and balloon comments like in Word 2003. A full-fledged outliner. PDF export and printing. And much, much more!


PlanMaker: More than 330 calculation functions. Support for complex numbers and array calculations. Goal seeker. Named ranges. Syntax highlighting. A powerful charting engine that can display and edit any chart created by Microsoft Excel. 
PDF export and printing. And much, much more!



SoftMaker Presentations: Drawings, pictures, AutoShapes, color gradients, and patterns. All slide transitions and animations that you know from PowerPoint. Matching color schemes. A large collection of ready-made design templates. 
PDF export and printing. And much, much more!




JETCET Print: SoftMaker Office 2008 is now able for the first time to print on many printers directly from the Pocket PC. We are bundling an integrated copy of JETCET Print for Windows 5 and 6 with SoftMaker Office.



SoftMaker Office lets you complete on the road all the tasks for which you use Word, Excel, and PowerPoint on your desktop computer.



Imagine that: An office suite on your Pocket PC that works just like Microsoft Office on your desktop computer!
